column6: VILLAINOUS BETRAYAL! MARTIAL ARTS MASTERY! KUNG-FU ACTION! Shang-Chi may have found a new home with the Lower Caste, but can he keep them safe? Can Shang-Chi keep his vow of peace? Will Laughing Skull laugh last? Or will Shang-Chi kick that smile right off his face?!
column8: | writer:Haden Blackman | penciller (cover):Francesco Francavilla | artist:Dalibor Talajic
